import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import CheckCircleIcon from "@mui/icons-material/CheckCircle" import EditIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Edit" import DeleteIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Delete" import {db} from "../../firebase.js" import { collection, query, onSnapshot, doc, updateDoc, deleteDoc, QuerySnapshot } from "firebase/firestore" const Todoitem = ({item}) => { let { id, task, completed } = item const [newTask, setNewTask] = useState([task]) const handleDelete = async (id) => { await deleteDoc(doc(db, "todos", id)); } return (

{task}

{id}

) } export default Todoitem
